MS - CNN detector.from sentence: The performance of the MS - CNN detector was evaluated on the KITTI and Caltech Pedestrian benchmarks .

single CPU core ( 2.40 GHz ).from sentence: All times are reported for implementation on a single CPU core ( 2.40 GHz ) of an Intel Xeon E5 - 2630 server with 64 GB of RAM .

NVIDIA Titan GPU.from sentence: An NVIDIA Titan GPU was used for CNN computations .
